Enums/SDWebImageOptions.html#/c:@E@SDWeb.name: SDWebImageWaitStoreCache
Enums/SDWebImageOptions.html#/c:@E@SDWeb.abstract: By default, when we load the image from network, the image will be written to the cache (memory and disk, controlled by your storeCacheType context option)

Enums/SDWebImageOptions.html#/c:@E@SDWeb.name: SDWebImageTransformVectorImage
Enums/SDWebImageOptions.html#/c:@E@SDWeb.abstract: We usually don’t apply transform on vector images, because vector images supports dynamically changing to any size, rasterize to a fixed size will loss details. To modify vector images, you can process the vector data at runtime (such as modifying PDF tag / SVG element).

Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.name: SDImageCacheTypeNone
Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.abstract: For query and contains op in response, means the image isn’t available in the image cache

Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.name: SDImageCacheTypeDisk
Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.abstract: For query and contains op in response, means the image was obtained from the disk cache.

Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.name: SDImageCacheTypeMemory
Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.abstract: For query and contains op in response, means the image was obtained from the memory cache.

Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.name: SDImageCacheTypeAll
Enums/SDImageCacheType.html#/c:@E@SDImag.abstract: For query and contains op in response, this type is not available and take no effect.

Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.name: SDImageCacheConfigExpireTypeAccessDate
Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.abstract: When the image cache is accessed it will update this value

Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.name: SDImageCacheConfigExpireTypeModificationDate
Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.abstract: When the image cache is created or modified it will update this value (Default)

Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.name: SDImageCacheConfigExpireTypeCreationDate
Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.abstract: When the image cache is created it will update this value

Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.name: SDImageCacheConfigExpireTypeChangeDate
Enums/SDImageCacheConfigExpireType.html#.abstract: When the image cache is created, modified, renamed, file attribute updated (like permission, xattr) it will update this value

Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.name: SDImageCacheQueryMemoryData
Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.abstract: By default, we do not query image data when the image is already cached in memory. This mask can force to query image data at the same time. However, this query is asynchronously unless you specify SDImageCacheQueryMemoryDataSync

Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.name: SDImageCacheQueryMemoryDataSync
Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.abstract: By default, when you only specify SDImageCacheQueryMemoryData, we query the memory image data asynchronously. Combined this mask as well to query the memory image data synchronously.

Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.name: SDImageCacheScaleDownLargeImages
Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.abstract: By default, images are decoded respecting their original size. On iOS, this flag will scale down the

Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.name: SDImageCacheAvoidDecodeImage
Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.abstract: By default, we will decode the image in the background during cache query and download from the network. This can help to improve performance because when rendering image on the screen, it need to be firstly decoded. But this happen on the main queue by Core Animation.

Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.name: SDImageCacheDecodeFirstFrameOnly
Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.abstract: By default, we decode the animated image. This flag can force decode the first frame only and produce the static image.

Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.name: SDImageCachePreloadAllFrames
Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.abstract: By default, for SDAnimatedImage, we decode the animated image frame during rendering to reduce memory usage. This flag actually trigger preloadAllAnimatedImageFrames = YES after image load from disk cache

Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.name: SDImageCacheMatchAnimatedImageClass
Enums/SDImageCacheOptions.html#/c:@E@SDI.abstract: By default, when you use SDWebImageContextAnimatedImageClass context option (like using SDAnimatedImageView which designed to use SDAnimatedImage), we may still use UIImage when the memory cache hit, or image decoder is not available, to behave as a fallback solution.

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodeFir.name: SDImageCoderDecodeFirstFrameOnly
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodeFir.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether to decode the first frame only for animated image during decoding. (NSNumber). If not provide, decode animated image if need.

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodeSca.name: SDImageCoderDecodeScaleFactor
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodeSca.abstract: A CGFloat value which is greater than or equal to 1.0. This value specify the image scale factor for decoding. If not provide, use 1.0. (NSNumber)

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodePre.name: SDImageCoderDecodePreserveAspectRatio
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodePre.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether to keep the original aspect ratio when generating thumbnail images (or bitmap images from vector format).

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodeThu.name: SDImageCoderDecodeThumbnailPixelSize
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderDecodeThu.abstract: A CGSize value indicating whether or not to generate the thumbnail images (or bitmap images from vector format). When this value is provided, the decoder will generate a thumbnail image which pixel size is smaller than or equal to (depends the .preserveAspectRatio) the value size.

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeFir.name: SDImageCoderEncodeFirstFrameOnly
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeFir.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether to encode the first frame only for animated image during encoding. (NSNumber). If not provide, encode animated image if need.

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeCom.name: SDImageCoderEncodeCompressionQuality
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeCom.abstract: A double value between 0.0-1.0 indicating the encode compression quality to produce the image data. 1.0 resulting in no compression and 0.0 resulting in the maximum compression possible. If not provide, use 1.0. (NSNumber)

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeBac.name: SDImageCoderEncodeBackgroundColor
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeBac.abstract: A UIColor(NSColor) value to used for non-alpha image encoding when the input image has alpha channel, the background color will be used to compose the alpha one. If not provide, use white color.

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeMax.name: SDImageCoderEncodeMaxPixelSize
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeMax.abstract: A CGSize value indicating the max image resolution in pixels during encoding. For vector image, this also effect the output vector data information about width and height. The encoder will not generate the encoded image larger than this limit. Note it always use the aspect ratio of input image..

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeMax.name: SDImageCoderEncodeMaxFileSize
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeMax.abstract: A NSUInteger value specify the max output data bytes size after encoding. Some lossy format like JPEG/HEIF supports the hint for codec to automatically reduce the quality and match the file size you want. Note this option will override the SDImageCoderEncodeCompressionQuality, because now the quality is decided by the encoder. (NSNumber)

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeEmb.name: SDImageCoderEncodeEmbedThumbnail
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderEncodeEmb.abstract: A Boolean value indicating the encoding format should contains a thumbnail image into the output data. Only some of image format (like JPEG/HEIF/AVIF) support this behavior. The embed thumbnail will be used during next time thumbnail decoding (provided .thumbnailPixelSize), which is faster than full image thumbnail decoding. (NSNumber)

Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderWebImageC.name: SDImageCoderWebImageContext
Constants.html#/c:@SDImageCoderWebImageC.abstract: A SDWebImageContext object which hold the original context options from top-level API. (SDWebImageContext)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextLoad.name: SDWebImageContextLoaderCachedImage
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextLoad.abstract: A UIImage instance from SDWebImageManager when you specify SDWebImageRefreshCached and image cache hit.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextSetI.name: SDWebImageContextSetImageOperationKey
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextSetI.abstract: A String to be used as the operation key for view category to store the image load operation. This is used for view instance which supports different image loading process. If nil, will use the class name as operation key. (NSString *)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextCust.name: SDWebImageContextCustomManager
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextCust.abstract: A SDWebImageManager instance to control the image download and cache process using in UIImageView+WebCache category and likes. If not provided, use the shared manager (SDWebImageManager *)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.name: SDWebImageContextImageCache
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.abstract: A id instance which conforms to SDImageCache protocol. It’s used to override the image manager’s cache during the image loading pipeline.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.name: SDWebImageContextImageLoader
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.abstract: A id instance which conforms to SDImageLoader protocol. It’s used to override the image manager’s loader during the image loading pipeline.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.name: SDWebImageContextImageCoder
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.abstract: A id instance which conforms to SDImageCoder protocol. It’s used to override the default image coder for image decoding(including progressive) and encoding during the image loading process.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.name: SDWebImageContextImageTransformer
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.abstract: A id instance which conforms SDImageTransformer protocol. It’s used for image transform after the image load finished and store the transformed image to cache. If you provide one, it will ignore the transformer in manager and use provided one instead. If you pass NSNull, the transformer feature will be disabled. (id)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.name: SDWebImageContextImageScaleFactor
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.abstract: A CGFloat raw value which specify the image scale factor. The number should be greater than or equal to 1.0. If not provide or the number is invalid, we will use the cache key to specify the scale factor. (NSNumber)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.name: SDWebImageContextImagePreserveAspectRatio
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether to keep the original aspect ratio when generating thumbnail images (or bitmap images from vector format).

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.name: SDWebImageContextImageThumbnailPixelSize
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextImag.abstract: A CGSize raw value indicating whether or not to generate the thumbnail images (or bitmap images from vector format). When this value is provided, the decoder will generate a thumbnail image which pixel size is smaller than or equal to (depends the .imagePreserveAspectRatio) the value size.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextQuer.name: SDWebImageContextQueryCacheType
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextQuer.abstract: A SDImageCacheType raw value which specify the source of cache to query. Specify SDImageCacheTypeDisk to query from disk cache only; SDImageCacheTypeMemory to query from memory only. And SDImageCacheTypeAll to query from both memory cache and disk cache. Specify SDImageCacheTypeNone is invalid and totally ignore the cache query.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextStor.name: SDWebImageContextStoreCacheType
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextStor.abstract: A SDImageCacheType raw value which specify the store cache type when the image has just been downloaded and will be stored to the cache. Specify SDImageCacheTypeNone to disable cache storage; SDImageCacheTypeDisk to store in disk cache only; SDImageCacheTypeMemory to store in memory only. And SDImageCacheTypeAll to store in both memory cache and disk cache.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextOrig.name: SDWebImageContextOriginalQueryCacheType
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextOrig.abstract: The same behavior like SDWebImageContextQueryCacheType, but control the query cache type for the original image when you use image transformer feature. This allows the detail control of cache query for these two images. For example, if you want to query the transformed image from both memory/disk cache, query the original image from disk cache only, use [.queryCacheType : .all, .originalQueryCacheType : .disk]

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextOrig.name: SDWebImageContextOriginalStoreCacheType
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextOrig.abstract: The same behavior like SDWebImageContextStoreCacheType, but control the store cache type for the original image when you use image transformer feature. This allows the detail control of cache storage for these two images. For example, if you want to store the transformed image into both memory/disk cache, store the original image into disk cache only, use [.storeCacheType : .all, .originalStoreCacheType : .disk]

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextAnim.name: SDWebImageContextAnimatedImageClass
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextAnim.abstract: A Class object which the instance is a UIImage/NSImage subclass and adopt SDAnimatedImage protocol. We will call initWithData:scale:options: to create the instance (or initWithAnimatedCoder:scale: when using progressive download) . If the instance create failed, fallback to normal UIImage/NSImage.

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextDown.name: SDWebImageContextDownloadRequestModifier
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextDown.abstract: A id instance to modify the image download request. It’s used for downloader to modify the original request from URL and options. If you provide one, it will ignore the requestModifier in downloader and use provided one instead. (id)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextDown.name: SDWebImageContextDownloadResponseModifier
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextDown.abstract: A id instance to modify the image download response. It’s used for downloader to modify the original response from URL and options. If you provide one, it will ignore the responseModifier in downloader and use provided one instead. (id)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextDown.name: SDWebImageContextDownloadDecryptor
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextDown.abstract: A id instance to decrypt the image download data. This can be used for image data decryption, such as Base64 encoded image. If you provide one, it will ignore the decryptor in downloader and use provided one instead. (id)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextCach.name: SDWebImageContextCacheKeyFilter
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextCach.abstract: A id instance to convert an URL into a cache key. It’s used when manager need cache key to use image cache. If you provide one, it will ignore the cacheKeyFilter in manager and use provided one instead. (id)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextCach.name: SDWebImageContextCacheSerializer
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageContextCach.abstract: A id instance to convert the decoded image, the source downloaded data, to the actual data. It’s used for manager to store image to the disk cache. If you provide one, it will ignore the cacheSerializer in manager and use provided one instead. (id)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageErrorDownlo.name: SDWebImageErrorDownloadStatusCodeKey
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageErrorDownlo.abstract: The HTTP status code for invalid download response (NSNumber *)

Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageProgressUni.name: SDWebImageProgressUnitCountUnknown
Constants.html#/c:@SDWebImageProgressUni.abstract: The value specify that the image progress unit count cannot be determined because the progressBlock is not been called.

Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.name: avoidAutoSetImage
Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.abstract: By default, we set the image to the view at the beginning of the animations. You can disable this and provide custom set image process

Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.name: duration
Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.abstract: The duration of the transition animation, measured in seconds. Defaults to 0.5.

Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.name: timingFunction
Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.abstract: The timing function used for all animations within this transition animation (macOS).

Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.name: animationOptions
Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.abstract: A mask of options indicating how you want to perform the animations.

Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.name: prepares
Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.abstract: A block object to be executed before the animation sequence starts.

Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.name: animations
Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.abstract: A block object that contains the changes you want to make to the specified view.

Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.name: completion
Classes/SDWebImageTransition.html#/c:obj.abstract: A block object to be executed when the animation sequence ends.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: manager
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: The web image manager used by prefetcher to prefetch images.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: maxConcurrentPrefetchCount
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: Maximum number of URLs to prefetch at the same time. Defaults to 3.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: options
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: The options for prefetcher. Defaults to SDWebImageLowPriority.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: context
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: The context for prefetcher. Defaults to nil.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: delegateQueue
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: Queue options for prefetcher when call the progressBlock, completionBlock and delegate methods. Defaults to Main Queue.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: delegate
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: The delegate for the prefetcher. Defaults to nil.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: sharedImagePrefetcher
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns the global shared image prefetcher instance. It use a standalone manager which is different from shared manager.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithImageManager:
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: Allows you to instantiate a prefetcher with any arbitrary image manager.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: -prefetchURLs:
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: Assign list of URLs to let SDWebImagePrefetcher to queue the prefetching. It based on the image manager so the image may from the cache and network according to the options property.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: -prefetchURLs:progress:completed:
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: Assign list of URLs to let SDWebImagePrefetcher to queue the prefetching. It based on the image manager so the image may from the cache and network according to the options property.

Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.name: -cancelPrefetching
Classes/SDWebImagePrefetcher.html#/c:obj.abstract: Remove and cancel all the prefeching for the prefetcher.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: delegate
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The delegate for manager. Defaults to nil.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: imageCache
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The image cache used by manager to query image cache.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: imageLoader
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The image loader used by manager to load image.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: transformer
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The image transformer for manager. It’s used for image transform after the image load finished and store the transformed image to cache, see SDImageTransformer.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: optionsProcessor
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The options processor is used, to have a global control for all the image request options and context option for current manager.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: defaultImageCache
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The default image cache when the manager which is created with no arguments. Such as shared manager or init.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: defaultImageLoader
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The default image loader for manager which is created with no arguments. Such as shared manager or init.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: -initWithCache:loader:
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Allows to specify instance of cache and image loader used with image manager.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: -loadImageWithURL:options:progress:completed:
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Downloads the image at the given URL if not present in cache or return the cached version otherwise.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: -loadImageWithURL:options:context:progress:completed:
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Downloads the image at the given URL if not present in cache or return the cached version otherwise.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: -removeFailedURL:
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Remove the specify URL from failed black list.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: -removeAllFailedURLs
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Remove all the URL from failed black list.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: -cacheKeyForURL:
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Return the cache key for a given URL, does not considerate transformer or thumbnail.

Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.name: -cacheKeyForURL:context:
Classes/SDWebImageManager.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Return the cache key for a given URL and context option.

Classes/SDWebImageCombinedOperation.html.name: -cancel
Classes/SDWebImageCombinedOperation.html.abstract: Cancel the current operation, including cache and loader process

Classes/SDWebImageCombinedOperation.html.name: cacheOperation
Classes/SDWebImageCombinedOperation.html.abstract: The cache operation from the image cache query

Classes/SDWebImageCombinedOperation.html.name: loaderOperation
Classes/SDWebImageCombinedOperation.html.abstract: The loader operation from the image loader (such as download operation)

Classes/SDWebImageActivityIndicator.html.name: grayIndicator
Classes/SDWebImageActivityIndicator.html.abstract: These indicator use the fixed color without dark mode support

Classes/SDWebImageActivityIndicator.html.name: largeIndicator
Classes/SDWebImageActivityIndicator.html.abstract: These indicator use the system style, supports dark mode if available (iOS 13+/macOS 10.14+)

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.name: -initWithStatusCode:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.abstract: Create the response modifier with HTTP Status code.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.name: -initWithVersion:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.abstract: Create the response modifier with HTTP Version. Status code defaults to 200.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.name: -initWithHeaders:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.abstract: Create the response modifier with HTTP Headers. Status code defaults to 200.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.name: -initWithStatusCode:version:headers:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderResponseModi.abstract: Create the response modifier with HTTP Status Code, Version and Headers.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.name: -initWithMethod:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.abstract: Create the request modifier with HTTP Method.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.name: -initWithHeaders:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.abstract: Create the request modifier with HTTP Headers.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.name: -initWithBody:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.abstract: Create the request modifier with HTTP Body.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.name: -initWithMethod:headers:body:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderRequestModif.abstract: Create the request modifier with HTTP Method, Headers and Body.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.name: request
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.abstract: The request used by the operation’s task.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.name: response
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.abstract: The response returned by the operation’s task.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.name: credential
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.abstract: The credential used for authentication challenges in -URLSession:task:didReceiveChallenge:completionHandler:.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.name: minimumProgressInterval
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.abstract: The minimum interval about progress percent during network downloading. Which means the next progress callback and current progress callback’s progress percent difference should be larger or equal to this value. However, the final finish download progress callback does not get effected.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.name: -addHandlersForProgress:completed:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.abstract: Adds handlers for progress and completion. Returns a tokent that can be passed to -cancel: to cancel this set of

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.name: -cancel:
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderOperation.ht.abstract: Cancels a set of callbacks. Once all callbacks are canceled, the operation is cancelled.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: defaultDownloaderConfig
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: Gets the default downloader config used for shared instance or initialization when it does not provide any downloader config. Such as SDWebImageDownloader.sharedDownloader.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: downloadTimeout
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: The timeout value (in seconds) for each download operation.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: minimumProgressInterval
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: The minimum interval about progress percent during network downloading. Which means the next progress callback and current progress callback’s progress percent difference should be larger or equal to this value. However, the final finish download progress callback does not get effected.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: sessionConfiguration
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: The custom session configuration in use by NSURLSession. If you don’t provide one, we will use defaultSessionConfiguration instead.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: operationClass
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: Gets/Sets a subclass of SDWebImageDownloaderOperation as the default

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: urlCredential
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: Set the default URL credential to be set for request operations.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: username
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: Set username using for HTTP Basic authentication.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.name: password
Classes/SDWebImageDownloaderConfig.html#.abstract: Set password using for HTTP Basic authentication.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.name: config
Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.abstract: Downloader Config object - storing all kind of settings.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.name: requestModifier
Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the request modifier to modify the original download request before image load.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.name: responseModifier
Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the response modifier to modify the original download response during image load.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.name: decryptor
Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.abstract: Set the decryptor to decrypt the original download data before image decoding. This can be used for encrypted image data, like Base64.

Classes/SDWebImageDownloader.html#/c:obj.name: currentDownloadCount
